full_summary:
**LC4ISR System of Systems Engineering & Integration Sustainment Services Tender**
=====================================================

**Reference Number**
-----------------

* PW-RA-059-28917

**Publication Date and Tender Closing Date**
--------------------------------------

* Publication Date: January 13, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: March 1, 2023 at 2:00 p.m.

**Procurement Overview**
---------------------

The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) invites interested suppliers to submit a bid for the LC4ISR Capability SoS E&I Sustainment Services requirement.

**Tender Description**
--------------------

This is the fourth and final Request for Proposal (RFP) for the LC4ISR Capability sustainment services. The winning bidder will be required to meet the Security Requirements outlined in the tender documentation and as specified in the RFP.

**Key Requirements**
-------------------

* The tender is subject to the National Security Exception (NSE) and is limited to Canadian suppliers only.
* Bids from foreign suppliers will not be considered.
* The winning bidder will be required to complete and submit a Foreign Ownership, Control and Influence (FOCI) Questionnaire and associated documentation prior to contract award.
* The tender requires the completion of a Contract Security Program Application for Registration (AFR) form at the time of bid submission.

**Security Requirements**
----------------------

The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement. Interested bidders are advised to review the security requirements for contracting with the Government of Canada prior to submitting a bid. The Government of Canada's security requirements for contracting can be found at [https://www.canada.ca/fr/resource/exigences-de-sécurité-pour-la-passation-de-marchés-avec-le-gouvernement-du-canada.html](https://www.canada.ca/fr/resource/exigences-de-sécurité-pour-la-passation-de-marchés-avec-le-gouvernement-du-canada.html)

**Instructions for Submissions**
------------------------------

The tender description can be found in the RFP documents. All interested suppliers must submit a completed AFR form at the time of bid submission.

**Attachments**
---------------

The tender documentation can be found at [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/).
